meaningMnemonic: A religious <radical>leader</radical> wearing a <radical>mask</radical> could be either a <kanji>monk</kanji> or a <kanji>priest</kanji>. You don’t know, their face is covered by a mask!
readingMnemonic: This <kanji>monk</kanji> or <kanji>priest</kanji> is wearing a mask to protect their <reading>sou</reading>l (そう). You aren't a monk or a priest, so they don't want your not-religious-enough eyes to dirty their soul.
